name: KettleSwell
tag_list: domain-name, group-shop, community, tld, accredited-registrars, cheap-domains, domain
overview:
Mobilizing People Power For Cheaper Domain Name Prices

Typically people who are interested in purchasing domain names use search engines to locate cheap domain name providers. After several searches and comparisons they select the most affordable provider and purchase the new domain, renew an existing domain, or transfer a domain. The individual has no power over what is a fair price to pay. With tens of thousands of domain transactions occurring each day KettleSwell focuses this scattered buying power to provide more affordable pricing. On a 24/7 schedule we provide the Top 5 best deals for the type of domain and required service a group of individuals are looking for across the world. If the minimum number of members within a group is reached the group wins and reaps the benefit of the stated lower price for that domain.

Across the world there are over 1 million domain name transactions per week (source: DailyChanges.com); over 200,000 transactions per day. With popular registrars such as GoDaddy, eNom, and Network Solutions losing over 100,000 domains a week due to competition such a service becomes valuable to both Accredited Registrars and deal-hungry, nickel & diming Customers.

We work with accredited registrars such as GoDaddy, Network Solutions, eNom, and others across the world to provide an attractive pricing for users and the desired participant count they’re after. This offer is then presented to users for a specific time period.
